org.hps.record

Interface RecordProcessor<RecordType>

  • Type Parameters:
    RecordType - the concrete type of the event record
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractRecordProcessor, CompositeRecordProcessor, EpicsEtProcessor, EpicsEvioProcessor, EpicsRunProcessor, EtEventProcessor, EtSystemMonitor, EtSystemStripCharts, EventDashboard.EventDashboardUpdater, EvioDetectorConditionsProcessor, EvioEventProcessor, MaxRecordsProcessor, PreStartProcessor, ScalersEvioProcessor, SvtConfigEvioProcessor, SyncEventProcessor, TiTimeOffsetEvioProcessor, TriggerConfigEvioProcessor

    public interface RecordProcessor<RecordType>
    This is a generic interface for event processing which implements hooks for starting the job, starting a new run, processing individual records, ending a run and ending a job. This interface should not be implemented directly. Instead the AbstractRecordProcessor should be extended with a specific type declaration.
